wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Godfrey Polson Corbett, 2nd Baron Rowallan,  (19 December 1895 – 30 November 1977), had a distinguished military career in the British Army and was Governor of Tasmania from 1959 to 1963. The Boy Scouts Association appointed him as its Chief Scout of the British Commonwealth and Empire from 1945 to 1959.
